Talk0103:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>But it's strange... As soon as it went
around <clr:0000>the rear side of the island<clr:ffff>, the
ship disappeared.
Talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's something I picked up on a previous
monster-control crew expedition.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I've been holding on to it as a lucky charm
all this time, but you'll probably get more
use out of it than I would!
Talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>Now then, time to put together a report
on what happened here and finally leave
this island.
Once I'm back, I'm turning over a new
leaf. No more scaredy-Sesami. I'm going
to be capable and courageous like you!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So thanks for the help and the inspiration,
mister!<sp:5:0:0> I hope I'll see you around!
Talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hey!<sp:5:0:0> You came back!<sp:0:4:0>I still plan on leaving this island once I've
got my report written up for the monster-
control crew, but ah...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>This is a big island and gathering up all
the info I need takes time.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_01>So long as I'm here, I might as well
unwind a little, right? Just for a while...
Talk0007_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> I should probably give you some
token of gratitude for risking your life!<sp:0:4:0>Here. <sp:5:0:0>Accept this with my thanks.
Talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Once the report is written, I'll leave the
island...<sp:5:0:0> Yeah.<sp:0:4:0>It's a big island, so it's taking me a while
to get my info together, that's all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_01>It's not at all related to how scenic and
relaxing this place is, no, sir.
Talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>You really helped me out, so I'd love to
give you a <clr:0000>Blue-Maned Lynel saber horn<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Just let me know once you've made some
space in your pouch!
Talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice_00>Oh, perfect, you've made some room!<sp:5:1:0>
Well then, once again...<sp:5:0:0>please accept
this with my thanks.
Talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Hey!<sp:5:0:0> I can tell just by looking at you that
something happened. What's up?
Talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Who theâ€”<sp:5:0:0> Mister, you must have a death
wish to make your way to this island.
Talk0018:
<snd:Think_00>I do think the pirates' hideout is
somewhere on this island...

But I can't do a thorough search with
those strongholds in my way.
Talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You've heard the rumors, right? They say
this is where the pirates that attacked
Lurelin Village hide out.<sp:0:4:0>I mean, I sure don't wanna be here...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>But I'm on a mission to locate the pirates'
hideout for the monster-control crew.
Talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> I want to finish my scouting and go
home already. <sp:5:0:0>If only those <clr:0000>monster
strongholds <clr:ffff>weren't there...
Talk0003_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionAngry_00>Hey, buddy...<sp:5:0:0> You're still hanging
around here?
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>From what I've seen, this island has
<clr:0000>three monster strongholds<clr:ffff>.
Talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's my mission to scout out the
pirates' hideout.

But there are <clr:0000>three monster strongholds<clr:ffff>
keeping me from investigating.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> I wish those <clr:0000>strongholds<clr:ffff> were
gone. It'd make things much easier.
Talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Hey there.<sp:5:0:0> Don't tell me...<sp:5:0:0> Something else
happened, didn't it?
Talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>The island seems so much more tranquil...
<sp:5:1:0>Could it be?

<sp:3:0:2:0b01>You cleared out the monster strongholds?<sp:5:1:0>
All three of them?!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Hah!<sp:5:0:0> You're amazing!<sp:5:1:0> Oh, you don't even
know how big a help that is.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Perfect timing, too, since I just saw a
<clr:0000>pirate ship<clr:ffff> coming in.
Talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>What's that? <sp:5:0:0>You found a pirate ship in a
cave around the back of the island?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Then that cave has to be their <clr:0000>hideout<clr:ffff>!
No doubt about it!
Talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>As much as I'd love to march right in
there and rout the pirates...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>I'm only a scout. Even thinking about
taking on a force like that turns my legs
into jelly.
So what now? Do I slink away to safety
or <clr:0000>fight the pirates in their hideout<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think_01>I'll just think it over until I can move
my legs again...
Talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>Just as the pirate ship went around the
<clr:0000>rear of the island<clr:ffff>, it vanished.<sp:0:4:0>If they're mooring at their <clr:0000>hideout <clr:ffff>over
there, then this scouting mission just
turned into an <clr:0000>eradication<clr:ffff> one.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>The thought of which petrifies me...<sp:0:4:0><snd:Sad_00>So what now? Do I run home? Or do I
locate the <clr:0000>hideout<clr:ffff> and inevitably die
trying to <clr:0000>fight the pirate horde<clr:ffff>?
Talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>You...<sp:5:0:0>defeated every last pirate on the
ship?<sp:5:1:0> That's incredible!<sp:5:0:0> You're like a
one-man monster-control crew!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I was only planning on scouting the place
out. HQ's going to be thrilled to hear that
the pirates are no longer a threat!
Talk0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>By the by,<sp:5:0:0> I just now saw a <clr:0000>pirate ship<clr:ffff>
approaching the island.
Talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>But as soon the ship rounded the <clr:0000>back of
the island<clr:ffff>, it disappeared.
Talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>A cave?<sp:5:0:0> Hidden around the back of the
island? And there was a pirate ship?!<sp:0:4:0>You beat every single pirate on the ship
too?!<sp:5:1:0> Holy cow!<sp:5:0:0> You're like a one-man
monster-control crew!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I mean, I'm part of a monster-control
crew, and I still lost my nerve. Thanks
to you, I can finally breathe easy.
Talk0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>So where did it go?<sp:0:4:0>Maybe the pirates really do have a
hideout on this island, and that's where
the ship disappeared to.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>But that would make it the monster-
control crew's duty to find and <clr:0000>eradicate<clr:ffff>
them, not just scout things out...
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>I can handle one or two enemies, but that
sounds like...more. Ugh, I'm so nervous,
I'm frozen to this spot.
Do I retreat?<sp:5:0:0> Or do I locate the <clr:0000>hideout<clr:ffff>
and try to fight the pirates myself?<sp:5:0:0> Oooh,
what should I do?
Talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Heh heh...<sp:5:0:0> Weren't expecting something
that rare, were you?<sp:0:4:0>I picked it up on a previous monster-
control-crew expedition.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I've been holding on to it as a lucky charm
all this time, but you'll probably get more
use out of it than I would.
Talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:TalkPositive_00>If the pirates are hiding out on the rear
side of the island, then <clr:0000>eradicating<clr:ffff> them
would be for the betterment of society...
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Y-you hear that, legs? Let's swallow those
nerves and get moving again. Please?<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think_01>Do I retreat to safety or <clr:0000>storm the
hideout<clr:ffff>? I want to help, but I don't
want to throw my life away.
Talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Huh?<snd:QuestionAngry_01> Hey, make some room in your
pouch already! <sp:5:0:0>I'm offering you a
<clr:0000>Blue-Maned Lynel saber horn <clr:ffff>here!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Well, once you pare down that absurd
amount of stuff, the horn's all yours.
I'm that grateful!
